issue.title: [R] Don't use rlang::as_label
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14239](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14239). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
rlang is about to release with a change to as_label that causes a test of ours to fail. We can restore the previous behavior, which is more useful for our purposes, by using deparse().

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14239?focusedCommentId=17430111) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11338
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11338>
